thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com | 17 of 805
thread.title: Alan Cobb

author: Alan Cobb
title: Alan Cobb
text: Booked on-line through Aer Lingus. Went straight to the Desk all details retrieved straight away. Added extra driver. One area of confusion is the Damage Waiver Insurance through AXA this is not what you think it is as you still need to cover the 2,500 euros with Thrifty. As explained if you had an accident you would then need to claim this back from AXA. I think this needs to be more specific within its explanation from the outset.
